Subject: Unstoppable Luxury 2024 report, Day 2 Sustainability Week, Security Investment Programme, Updated Gift Giving Policy, Summer with Level Shoes
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1046&user=10620> 	

GCC Personal Luxury 2024: Unstoppable report is out!


Our Intelligence team, led by Jasmina Banda and Mo Shadman, have published the GCC Personal Luxury 2024: Unstoppable report, unveiling a comprehensive snapshot of the region's personal luxury market. This report highlights the region’s robust performance and signals a promising future for luxury retail in the GCC. 

Explore the report to know more about:

*	Drivers Behind the Growth
*	Divergent Trends Across Categories 
*	The Future of Luxury in the GCC

chunks.text:
Our Intelligence team, led by Jasmina Banda and Mo Shadman, have published the GCC Personal Luxury 2024: Unstoppable report, unveiling a comprehensive snapshot of the region's personal luxury market. This report highlights the region’s robust performance and signals a promising future for luxury retail in the GCC. 

Explore the report to know more about:

*	Drivers Behind the Growth
*	Divergent Trends Across Categories 
*	The Future of Luxury in the GCC  

Read more and dive into the report here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1047&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/8a352100d6d93d8416c83e1543754d3e1262419376.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/9c0bdcbf45b89a8ccdd0867df2e6519d1294062490.png> 	

Day 2 of Sustainability Week!

Each day brings new opportunities to learn, engage, and contribute.
Let’s stay inspired and keep creating impact together.


Dial in <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1048&user=10620>  to tomorrow's Webinar for a powerful conversation on how protecting
nature is not just good for the planet.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/8a352100d6d93d8416c83e1543754d3e1262419376.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	
Group's 3- year security investment programme 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1049&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/8a352100d6d93d8416c83e1543754d3e1262419376.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	
Group's 3- year security investment programme 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1049&user=10620> 	

A bold and strategic step forward in strengthening our resilience, protecting our digital ecosystem, and securing the trust of our customers, partners, and people.

As part of this exciting transformation, we are also pleased to announce our new partnership with Capgemini, who will join us as our Managed Security Service Partner. Together we will unlock new capabilities that will future proof our Group, in an increasingly complex Cyber landscape.

Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1049&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Updated Gift Giving Policy

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1050&user=10620> 	

The updated gift-giving policy is now available. Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1050&user=10620>  to learn more about the new process for offering gifts from Chalhoub Group to team members, third parties, and stakeholders globally

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Step into summer at Level Shoes!

The updated gift-giving policy is now available. Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1050&user=10620>  to learn more about the new process for offering gifts from Chalhoub Group to team members, third parties, and stakeholders globally

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Step into summer at Level Shoes!

Immerse yourself in the world of LOEWE Paula’s Ibiza as we unveil a sunglasses pop-up inspired by the golden era of Ibiza’s iconic Paula’s boutique — a celebration of carefree spirit and bold style. 
Adding to the season, we’ve partnered with The Cha Club to introduce a refreshing twist to summer rituals, featuring two exclusive Cloud Matcha flavors and cloud-shaped madeleines making their debut in-store.

Available for a limited time only — don't miss it!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/b3be8a158267336ff9cf8b968eb53a851139700188.gif> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1051&user=10620>

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group family.
